name: Johan Olof Wallin
obverse: Head of Johan Olof Wallin facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: JOH. OL. WALLIN NAT. D. XV. OCT. MDCCLXXIX.
reverse: A harp underneath the big dipper constellation.
description: Johan Olof Wallin, (15 October 1779 – 30 June 1839), was a Swedish minister, orator, poet and later Church of Sweden Archbishop of Uppsala, Sweden between 1837-1839.
